title: Plasma extracellular vesicle tau and TDP-43 as diagnostic biomarkers in FTD and ALS
details: M Chatterjee, S Özdemir, C Fritz, W Möbius… - Nature Medicine, 2024
abstract: Minimally invasive biomarkers are urgently needed to detect molecular pathology in frontotemporal dementia (FTD) and amyotrophic lateral sclerosis (ALS). Here, we show that plasma extracellular vesicles (EVs) contain quantifiable amounts of TDP …

title: Addressing Healthcare-related Racial and LGBTQ+ Biases in Pretrained Language Models
details: S Xie, S Hassanpour, S Vosoughi - Findings of the Association for Computational …, 2024
abstract: Recent studies have highlighted the issue of Pretrained Language Models (PLMs) inadvertently propagating social stigmas and stereotypes, a critical concern given their widespread use. This is particularly problematic in sensitive areas like …
